channel.title: TechJob on Hsing-Yu Shih
channel.description: Recent content in TechJob on Hsing-Yu Shih

item.title: Comparison of Various PMs
item.description:
Why is everyone called PM?

  • Product Manager focuses on market, customers and product vision, deciding “what to do, for whom”; hailed as “Product CEO”
  • Program Manager stands above multiple projects, ensuring projects weave into a chain consistent with strategy, focusing on “Integration and Enablement”
  • Project Manager focuses on time, cost, scope triangle, managing “making things happen” through processes and nodes The three have intersections due to organizational scale and industry differences, but thinking levels descend from “Strategy -> Tactics -> Execution”

Core Responsibilities

Project Manager

  • Mission: Deliver clear outputs (building built, App launched) and achieve established metrics (Time / Cost / Scope)
  • Key Activities: Scheduling, risk control, milestone tracking, stakeholder communication
  • Success Indicators: Project on-time rate, budget control rate, scope change frequency

Program Manager

  • Mission: Connect multiple projects and processes, deliver measurable “business results” or “strategic transformation outcomes”
  • Key Activities: Formulate Roadmap, allocate cross-project resources, governance standardization, measure benefits
  • Success Indicators: Added value, strategic goal achievement, organizational capability improvement

Product Manager

  • Mission: Find market pain points, define product positioning, continuously drive PMF (Product‑Market Fit)
  • Key Activities: Market/User research, product strategy, requirement prioritization, MVP validation
  • Success Indicators: ARR / MAU growth, retention rate, customer satisfaction, commercial gross profit

item.title: Nicknames of Taiwanese and Foreign Tech Companies
item.description:
Nicknames of Taiwanese and Foreign Tech Companies

Taiwanese Companies

IC Design (Pig Shit House)

Item Company Name Ptt, Dcard Nickname Explanation
1 MediaTek (聯發科) Fa Ge (Brother Fa), Fa Di (Brother Fa’s younger brother), M, Big M, McDonald’s, Duxing Road McDonald’s Called Fa Ge when bonuses are high, Fa Di when low. Because it’s called M, employees mock themselves as Duxing Road McDonald’s workers, serving fries. Called Big M because there used to be a Small M (MStar)
2 Novatek (聯詠) Lo Bah (Braised Pork), N Novatek sounds like “Lo Bah” (Braised Pork)
3 Realtek (瑞昱) Crab, R, King Crab, Hermit Crab, Seafood Restaurant Realtek Logo is a crab. King Crab refers to departments with high bonuses. If less bonus, netizens mock as Hermit Crab. Also called Seafood Restaurant due to crab.
4 Phison (群聯) PX Mart, P, Please support cashier Phison sounds like PX Mart (Quan Lian)
5 Silicon Motion (慧榮) S
7 Himax (奇景) Seahorse Himax sounds like Seahorse1
8 Airoha (達發) Bus, Fa Ge’s subsidiary A subsidiary of MediaTek. English name Airoha sounds like early Aloha Bus
9 Raydium (瑞鼎) Ding Wang Take the word Ding. Since Ding Wang Spicy Pot is a relatively expensive restaurant, implying good bonuses2
10 Sitronix (矽創) Window Washing (Xi Chuang) Homonym of Sitronix
11 FocalTech (敦泰) Security There is a security company called Duntai Security
12 Ilitek (奕力) One Grain (Yi Li), Grain Grain (Li Li) Homonym of Ilitek. Or taken from poem “Every grain is hard work”, employees mocking hard work2
13 Winbond (華邦電) Bang Bang
14 Aspeed (信驊) Stock King
15 Nuvoton (新唐)

Brand Manufacturers

Item Company Name Ptt, Dcard Nickname Explanation
1 HTC (宏達電) Black Tea, Black Tea Shop, HTC, Auntie Black Tea Shop is homonym. Auntie refers to Cher Wang
2 ASUS (華碩) Stone ASUS quality, hit stone with egg
3 Acer (宏碁)
4 MSI (微星) Little Star, Chuuni Dragon, Meager Salary (Wei Xin), G Star Wei Xin implies salary given is not much
5 GIGABYTE (技嘉) Chicken Cutlet Shop English name GIGABYTE, GIBYTE pronunciation very like Chicken Cutlet (Ji Pai)2
6 Synology (群暉) Far East Google Company near Far Eastern Hospital MRT station, attracts top software talents like Google

Panel Manufacturers

Item Company Name Ptt, Dcard Nickname Explanation
1 AUO (友達) Lover, More than friends Name implies: More than friends (You Da), less than lovers
2 Innolux (群創) Bun (Baozi) Merged with Chi Mei Optoelectronics, named after Chi Mei Buns

System Manufacturers

Item Company Name Ptt, Dcard Nickname Explanation
1 Pegatron (和碩) Pika Sounds like its English name Pegatron
2 Quanta (廣達) Meat Floss, Meat Floss Shop There is a meat floss factory called Guang Da Xiang Meat Floss
3 Wistron (緯創) W, Big W
4 Wiwynn (緯穎) Small w, we win Because it is a subsidiary of Wistron
5 Compal (仁寶) Baby (Bao Bao)
6 Lite-On (光寶) Light On English name LITEON, means light-on2
7 Advantech (研華)
8 ASRock (華擎) Little Stone, Demon Rock Spun off from ASUS so called Little Stone. Specializes in strange motherboards and products (Demon Board)
9 Delta (台達電) Delta, Triangle Logo is a triangle
10 Foxconn (鴻海) Grandpa Hai (Hai Gong Gong), Seaside, Seabed, Red Sea Take word Hai. Ah-Liang from “Kochikame” often says “You live by the seaside!” meaning “Nosy” (Because seaside has many tubes). Calling Foxconn Seaside implies company micromanages2
11 Inventec (英業達) Xiao Ying Name has word Ying
12 WNC (啟碁) Taoist Priest Homonym, Taoist priest performs trance (Qi Ji)

Semiconductor Manufacturing

Item Company Name Ptt, Dcard Nickname Explanation
1 TSMC (台積電) Tai GG, GG, Protector of the Nation, Sacred Mountain, Big Brother, Ancestral Grave Smoking Because Taiwan has TSMC, China dares not attack Taiwan easily, so called Protector of the Nation Sacred Mountain. Ancestral Grave Smoking means those who enter TSMC are blessed by ancestors
2 UMC (聯德) Second Brother, U, Da Shuo Employees often use it as a springboard to TSMC, similar to grad school cram school “Da Shuo”
3 Vanguard (世界先進) Wonderland, RO Homonym of Advanced (Xian Jin)
4 ASE (日月光) Cult (Shen Jiao) From fictional organization Sun Moon Holy Cult in Jin Yong’s novel “The Smiling, Proud Wanderer”2
5 Nanya (南亞科) Dentistry (Ya Ke)
6 Inotera (華亞科) Slippery Dentistry (Hua Ya Ke)
7 SPIL (矽品) Three Mouths, Three Mouths Gang That one with three mouths, many mouths. Three Mouths Gang (Because last character Pin has three mouths)
8 PSMC (力積電) Fake G, Little GG Called Fake G because name easily confused with TSMC

Software, Telecom, Banking

Item Company Name Ptt, Dcard Nickname Explanation
1 Chunghwa Telecom (中華電信) Flower Planting (Zhong Hua), Flower Planting Telecom, Flower Planting Snack, Small Company (by Douglas Hsu) Homonym, plus work is very leisurely
2 Taiwan Mobile (台灣大哥大)
3 Far EasTone (遠傳) Big Company Netizens responding to its boss Douglas Hsu’s remarks
4 Trend Micro (趨勢) Asia’s Largest Pure Software
5 Cathay (國泰) Big Tree, Broccoli Logo is a big tree, looks like broccoli
6 Dcard Pig’s Trotter, Low Card, Low Energy Card Homonym, and Dcard posts often too exaggerated and low energy so called Low Energy Card
7 iKala (愛卡拉) Kara Chicken

Foreign Companies

IC Design & Manufacturing

Item Company Name Taiwan Nickname China Nickname Explanation
1 Qualcomm (高通) Q
2 Marvell (邁威爾) Marvel Marvell pronunciation same as Marvel
3 Nvidia (英偉達) NV
4 Intel (英特爾) Toothpaste Factory Toothpaste Factory, Blue Factory Every generation of core i series performance increases a little bit, like squeezing toothpaste
5 AMD (超微) Bulldozer Factory Bulldozer Factory, Red Factory AM3 era processor name
6 Micron (美光) Light Light, Glow, Life Glow From recruitment slogan “Join Micron, Life Glows”
7 Texas Instruments (德儀)
8 Broadcom (博通)
9 NXP (恩智浦)

Brand & Software Design

Item Company Name Taiwan Nickname China Nickname Explanation
1 Google (科高) G G Corp, Dog Family Dog Family homonym of Google (Goo -> Gou)
2 Microsoft (微軟) M$、MS Giant Hard, Giant Infant3 M$ means Microsoft wants money for everything, Giant Hard from literal opposite of Microsoft
3 Meta (臉書) Face Family, M Corp Facebook translated as Face Book
4 Amazon (亞馬遜) Flax (Ya Ma), Rainforest, Banana Factory3 Amazon famous for being stingy to employees, benefits only willing to provide bananas
5 Apple (蘋果) Grandma (A Po) A Corp, Fruit Family
6 IBM (國際商業機器) Alien Tech Big Blue Rumored to really engage in alien technology
7 Netflix (網飛) N Corp, Netflix
8 Tiktok (抖音) Parents Raise in Vain Byte From “Once TikTok sounds, parents raise in vain”
9 Dropbox D Corp, Throw Box
10 Airbnb
11 Salesforce Sell Force
12 Orcale (甲骨文) Turtle Shell
13 Sony (索尼) $ony, Great Law Camera technology very powerful, just like magic
14 Dell (戴爾) Dumb Goose (Dai E)
15 Tencent (騰訊) Penguin Tencent Logo is a penguin
16 Baidu (百度) Hundred Poisons (Bai Du) Chinese netizens custom, homonym
17 Uber Black Car
18 Uber Eats Wu Bo Yi
19 Foodpanda Panda
20 Garmin
21 Samsung (三星) Three Cool (San Shuang)

Semiconductor Equipment

Item Company Name Taiwan Nickname China Nickname Explanation
1 ASML (艾斯摩爾) A4ML ASML (Ah Si Mai) A4ML means this company gives very little bonus, Ah Si Mai is China’s ASML translation
2 TEL (東京威力科創)
3 ASM (先藝)
4 AMT (應材)
5 KLA (柯磊)
6 LAM (柯林研發)

System Manufacturers

Item Company Name Taiwan Nickname China Nickname Explanation
1 Supermicro (美超微)
2 Lenovo (聯想)

Famous Entrepreneurs

Item Name Nickname Explanation
1 Terry Gou Jelly (Guo Dong)
2 Lisa Su Mama Su
3 Jensen Huang Old Huang, Leather Jacket Swordsman, AI Godfather
4 Sundar Pichai Pi Chai
5 Elon Musk Iron Man, Ma Investment Advisor His words and actions have great influence on cryptocurrency
6 Sam Altman Altman
7 Rick Tsai Rick MediaTek CEO

  1. https://pttpedia.fandom.com/zh/wiki/PTT%E4%BC%81%E6%A5%AD%E7%B6%BD%E8%99%9F%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8 ↩︎

  2. https://mtk.tw/2022/09/%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E7%9A%84%E6%9A%B1%E7%A8%B1/ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎

  3. https://www.1point3acres.com/bbs/thread-533022-2-1.html ↩︎ ↩︎
